statements: UPDATE customer_payment_history SET payment_date = '2022-10-15', payment_amount = 150.00 WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE customer_payment_history SET credit_utilization = 0.35, payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE customer_id = 102
UPDATE customer_payment_history SET payment_method='Credit Card', payment_amount=100.50 WHERE customer_id=12345
UPDATE customer_payment_history SET credit_utilization=0.75, payment_date='2022-10-15' WHERE customer_id=54321
UPDATE customer_payments SET amount = 150, payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE customer_id = 100;
UPDATE credit_utilization SET balance = 500, utilization_rate = 0.25 WHERE customer_id = 200;
UPDATE customer_payments SET payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
UPDATE credit_utilization SET balance = 1500.00, credit_limit = 5000.00 WHERE customer_id = 200;
UPDATE CustomerPaymentHistory SET payment_amount = 500.00, payment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE CreditUtilization SET credit_limit = 1000.00, credit_used = 600.00 WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE CustomerPaymentHistory SET payment_amount = 500.00, payment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE CreditUtilization SET credit_limit = 1000.00, credit_used = 600.00 WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerPaymentHistory WHERE customer_id = 456)
UPDATE customers SET phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE payments SET payment_date='2021-10-15' WHERE payment_id=2;
